attributes.action: Make UK jobs avialable for UK citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make UK jobs avialable for UK citizens.
UK jobs should be made available to people from the UK first.. Companies should prove that they looked at local people fisrt and when not found then they should look abroad..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
